# Tender Notice

## Name of Tender
Oil Pumping and Remediation Services

## Reference Number
WS4623551653-Doc4628111738

## Amendment Number
2

### Notice Details
**Amendment Date:** June 25, 2024
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Tender Requirements
The Government of Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide oil pumping and remediation services for the “USAT Brigadier General M.G. Zalinski” for the Canadian Coast Guard.

**Tender Details:**
* **Region:** British Columbia
* **Expected Start Date:** July 8, 2024
* **Expected End Date:** August 31, 2024

### Tender Documents and Information
Please note that the closing time for the tender has been amended to June 27, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT. All supporting documentation and bid submission must be received by this time. Participation in the virtual Offeror’s conference is mandatory.

**Virtual Offeror’s Conference:**
* **Date:** June 14, 2024
* **Time:** 9:00 – 10:30 PDT

### Contact Information
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact:
Major, Andrea (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: andrea.major@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice and Attachments
The tender notice and attachments are available on the [CanadaBuys website](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19967987?extsite=MTk5Njc5ODdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) or the [Ariba Discovery website](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19967987?extsite=MTk5Njc5ODdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

### Trade Agreements and Regions of Opportunity
This tender is open to Canadian contractors who are compliant with the [Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA),
